title: Winter Frost VFX
description: Over 20 prefabs in Unreal Engine, also includes the Project with all the examples included and prepared for better uses, with the possibility of customization.
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template,with the possibility of customization.

- Over 20 prefabs in Unreal Engine, also includes the Project with all the examples included and prepared for better uses.

- You can change the color of any element in real time, as well as add a glow to any of the layers.

- also has audio effects

- This pack provides all the elements for your project, you can combine them as you like.

         


Features:

● All elements are made in niagara system.

● Optimized for games.

●It works just as good in 2D than in 3D.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.

● For your convenience, one universal material for flipbooks has been created, and several additional textures

● Animation of sprite sheets is carried out using dynamic parameters and a curve

● color and glow in each element layering you can change in 2 clicks in the Niagara system


Video:

https://youtu.be/F9BH-aQ5ALs


How to use:

https://youtu.be/pq7zJQDur10
technicalDetails:
Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 960x960 px.


● Frame rate: 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

● Distance_#[960,960].png 


Number of Unique Effects: 20

Number of Materials Instance: 101

Number of Materials: 2

Number of Textures:102

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
